body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.9.10 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

@hobu any interest in being listed as a maintainer for these packages (or any other packages in Spack)? You don't need to know anything about Spack, it just gives us a list of people to ping when a user reports build issues or wants to modify the build recipe. I can handle any Spack-specific questions.
title: Add py-liblas package
